document_data.name: Hapdash
document_data.Activities: Hapdash was in charge of creating alchemical products for the army of the mad [[half-elf]] mercenary [[Zarr]].
document_data.Personality: Hapdash was very zealous in his work. He had lost faith in Zarr and only wanted to make more alchemical experiments. Hapdash attacked anyone who tried to touch his laboratory .
